data.name: ComposeCommand_CompositeSchemaFile_Description
data.value: Specifies the path at which to write the composite schema file.

data.name: ComposeCommand_Description
data.value: Composes multiple source schemas into a single composite schema.

data.name: ComposeCommand_EnableGlobalObjectIdentification_Description
data.value: Determines whether the 'Query.node' field shall be added.

data.name: ComposeCommand_Error_NoSourceSchemaFilesFound
data.value: ❌ No GraphQL schema files were found in the working directory.

data.name: ComposeCommand_Error_SourceSchemaFileDoesNotExist
data.value: ❌ Source schema file '{0}' does not exist.

data.name: ComposeCommand_SourceSchemaFile_Description
data.value: Specifies the path to a source schema file (.graphqls) to include in the composition.

data.name: ComposeCommand_WorkingDirectory_Description
data.value: Sets the working directory for the command.
